description: This file defines an asynchronous FastAPI router for exposing an Agno Agent or Team in an AG-UI compatible streaming format. It includes functions to run agents or teams, handle streaming responses, and set up API endpoints for starting the process and checking status.

classes.name: APIRouter
classes.description: FastAPI router class used to define API endpoints.

methods.name: run_agent
methods.description: Runs an Agent with provided input, streams events in AG-UI format, handles errors.

methods.name: run_team
methods.description: Runs a Team with provided input, streams events in AG-UI format, handles errors.

methods.name: get_sync_agui_router
methods.description: Creates and returns a FastAPI router configured for either an Agent or a Team, with endpoints for starting the stream and checking status.
